TopicTitle: IRL Inception? My Weirdest Dream Yet

Articles.Content: I was just sleeping, when I began dreaming. in it, I was in the Hunger Games. Every once and a while (in the dream) I would wake up in my house and do a Hunger Games related game. Then I would wake up back in the Hunger Games and it would keep happening. Near the end of the Hunger Games, I ended up in a classroom in my school, where the other people competing (my classmates) would be there. Then I left school to go home, and some other weird stuff happened, involving evil clowns and Darth Vader. Then I woke up. The thing is, my dream felt so real. I actually somewhat didn't think it was a dream in my mind. Strange or what?
...0_0' I wasn't injecting you with experimental brain affecting chemicals...Why would you assume that?
I once had a dream involving me superjumping around a giant kitchen to get away from a slasher villain.

I once had a dream involving me superjumping around a giant kitchen to get away from a slasher villain.

In one of my dreams, I was in my school (but it was hollowed out and rusty), everything was like a desert, and some Freddy Krueger-esque guy started trying to kill me. What was weird was that it felt like I couldn't open eyes and end the dream.
i had a weird dream once when i was the main character in pride and prejudice.
Yo Dawg we heard you liked dreams so we put a dream in yo dream so you can dream while you dream.

I have a horrible memory of everything, including dreams, but I believe one time I woke up after I thought I had a "dream", but it turns out, I just awoke into another dream, and when I realized that I had a dream in a dream, I woke up. Of course, I may have been imagining that.

i had a weird dream once when i was the main character in pride and prejudice.

That is extremely weird, do you know which one?

I haven't had that many interesting dreams. One of them was a tornado appeared in the school field and was heading towards the hall.

That is extremely weird, do you know which one?

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elizabeth_Bennet

Another dream of mine involved me being led into a school by a secret agent. Some people were making some weird colorful device (that probably would cause mass destruction), and I had to destroy it. After destroying it, some stuff that shouldn't be described on this forum happened. Then I was in a highly populated apartment building leaning over because there was a shrimp/crab monster attacking. My dreams are weird.

I had a dream the world would end with several terrible earthquakes occurred in the Pacific ,and Atlantic ocean.This ended in a war were I lost my brother.Then,because of world war III (caused due to North Korea managing to nuke the mid-east after the earthquakes by pretending his naval ships were going there to help ,but actually turning it into a radioactive barren.)I hid in a bunker to only hear the explosions.After they ended I look out the door to find everything covered in sand ,and ruined.The people that were walking around told me i'm the last of the people who lived during the time were the United States wasn't the Industrial States of America.There I learned that many nations fell in the dust ,while many changed there name.After that well I saw an airship then I started hearing the song "Gaslamp funworks" from Kevin mcleod. That's were i wake up to my alarm that was playing the song.

I rarely remember my dreams, the last one i can remember is one where i was a transformer saving my family from a giant bear.

And i died in the end.
well my dream is the Onlydream i remember ever.
Kethane is one hell of a drug...

Okay. I have this one Recurring dream that i get ONLY when I'm on the verge of getting a girlfriend. here's the setup; It's a huge rave party! Me and [insert said girl here] enter the building and do party things. the building looks like a three story house on the outside. on the inside it's 11 stories tall. with balconies over looking a stage. the wall behind the stage is a large glass window. [insert part] at some point we go outside in the back yard where a monster of variable appearance attacks. [Running and screaming] eventually we seek shelter in the uppermost room of the house. it has white carpet and creme colored walls. It's triangular in shape. We see the shadow of the giant monster from the inside despite it standing on the roof. [something happens] I wake up in a tiled mall-like area that's empty. i travel through an air duct and come out in a dimly lit area with red carpet and numerous water fountains with people from the party painting on easels. I then enter a long tall corridor. like at a movie theater. walls are black with those fancy lights and the carpet's red. there is a door at the end. i reach it, open it and wake up. WTH?
I once had a dream where my parents and I moved to a new house. I began exploring the house's dimly lit corridors, and that's all that happened for the rest of the dream.
I once had a dream where I fell asleep and had a dream about having a dream where I fell asleep and had a dream and it kept repeating for about half an hour.

Weird dream I just had. Me and my class were having a field trip IN the game game Ni No Kuni, but because we kept getting defeated and respawning a long way back, we went back to a stranger version of my school. It was very dark, and couldn't see anything. I fell over and had to get help. After going back home, I ended up on a school field trip in a fake SCP (it was called SCP-893, I think), which was a building with some weird little boy ghost in it. Somehow, I killed the SCP, and a bunch of lights in one row started going out in slo-mo. A giant wall of darkness appeared, and one of my friends was engulfed in it. Me and some other guy ran down a hallway, running from the darkness. We came across three doors, one said "Nowhere," one said "Somewhere" and the other I can't remember. Looking through the windows on the "Somewhere" door, it turned out that it led to my school. I then ran through it, and went home in a car. Strange or what?

Also, the friend of mine who died also died in the Hunger Games dream.

I once had a dream where I fell off a platform and died, causing me to wake up. I went back to sleep and picked up from where I left off, except this time I didn't die. Then I went into an elevator which went down too fast, pressing me against the ceiling and making me black out from the G forces, waking me up again. I went back to sleep and continued from where the elevator let me off.
